review: Very pleased with Fire TV Stick! We have been using Chrome cast and the Fire Stick is so so much better! I love the way it interfaces with my Prime account right out of the box (no need to do anything). I can watch the movies I have purchased in my library in the past, I love the add to  watch list feature and everything is organized by category within the menu… so easy to use! Tonight we are going to watch a new release that is not even available on our Charter cable VOD yet. It is was painless to set too, ready to go in less than 5 mins.
